title: Nearly New Elegant Family Home in Timber Creek w/ Pool/Clubhouse!
posting_body: WE WILL NOT BEGIN SHOWING HOME
Built in 2017, Still Nearly NEW Home in Timber Creek!
Gorgeous bright and spacious home with a great floor plan, tons of windows, quartz counter tops and high end Stainless Steel appliances.
This two story home features a daylight basement backing to a quiet preserved Forest.
Fully fenced and sodded rear yard with irrigation system.
Grand master suite featuring extensive walk-in closet and 5 piece bath.
Hardwoods throughout first floor and great room floor plan for your entertainment needs.
Attached garage (w/electric charger), fenced backyard patio for BBQ’s.
Daylight basement with sizeable gameroom, 4th bedroom & bath.
Come live in this brand new community by Toll Brothers -- trails, club house, outdoor swimming pool, playgrounds, and more!
This lovely home is conveniently located In the New Timber Creek Development at 18329 44th Dr SE, Bothell, 98012.
This private neighborhood features an award winning clubhouse with an Outdoor Swimming Pool, 50+acres preserved space, walking trails/park.
Fernwood Elementary, Skyview Middle School & the new North Creek High School.
Left on York Rd which becomes 35th Ave SE.
This lovely Home is available for lease immediately for $3,100 per month.
First month’s rent + $3,100 security deposit due up front & $350 non-refundable fee. 12 month lease.
For more information email or contact Melissa at
- no history of property management collections
-landlord cannot re-use applications or credit reports
-tenant will be required to have a landscape contract
